item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, January 22, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ross Ulbricht granted a full pardon (649 points | 708 comments)
2. Stargate Project: SoftBank, OpenAI, Oracle, MGX to build data centers (522 points | 559 comments)
3. Moving on from React, a year later (91 points | 34 comments)
4. 0-click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord, other platforms (1100 points | 364 comments)
5. Hunyuan3D 2.0 – High-Resolution 3D Assets Generation (144 points | 61 comments)
6. Isolating complexity is the essence of successful abstractions (46 points | 4 comments)
7. Infinigen (31 points | 2 comments)
8. Tensor Product Attention Is All You Need (23 points | 17 comments)
9. What are these bumps on the top of a pull-tab can? (90 points | 3 comments)
10. Invisible Electrostatic Wall at 3M plant (1996) (308 points | 157 comments)
11. Why is zero plural? (2024) (35 points | 59 comments)
12. Interview with Jeff Atwood, Co-Founder of Stack Overflow (14 points | 16 comments)
13. Calm tech certification "rewards" less distracting tech (232 points | 65 comments)
14. Castle Game Engine: Web target – big progress, first 3 demos to try (58 points | 10 comments)
15. Open-source browser port of Pitfall from the Atari 2600 (38 points | 9 comments)

19. The Peppermills of Jens Quistgaard (60 points | 36 comments)

21. JReleaser: quick and effortless way to release your project (63 points | 18 comments)
22. HyperDX (YC S22) is hiring engineers to build open source observability ( | hide)
23. Rafael Araujo's 20 Mesmerizing Geometrical Masterpieces (2024) (95 points | 13 comments)
24. Sigstore: Making sure your software is what it claims to be (61 points | 18 comments)
25. Prime numbers so memorable that people hunt for them (119 points | 69 comments)
26. Flame: A small language model for spreadsheet formulas (2023) (4 points | 1 comment)
27. Liskov Substitution: The real meaning of inheritance (40 points | 31 comments)
28. More than 40% of postdocs leave academia, study reveals (167 points | 194 comments)
29. Show HN: I made a app that uses NFC as a physical switch to block distractions (153 points | 91 comments)
30. Concept cells help your brain abstract information and build memories (93 points | 7 comments)
